job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Why choose between doing meaningful work and having a fulfilling life At MITRE you can have both Thats because MITRE people are committed to tackling our nations toughest challengesand were committed to the longterm wellbeing of our employees MITRE is different from most technology companies We are a notforprofit corporation chartered to work for the public interest with no commercial conflicts to influence what we do The RampD centers we operate for the government create lasting impact in fields as diverse as cybersecurity healthcare aviation defense and enterprise transformation Were making a difference every dayworking for a safer healthier and more secure nation and world Our workplace reflects our values We offer competitive benefits exceptional professional development opportunities and a culture of innovation that embraces diversity inclusion flexibility collaboration and career growth If this sounds like the choice you want to make then choose MITREand make a difference with usbrbrMITREs Advanced Processing and Exploitation Technologies department effectively combines the deep technical knowledge required to develop capabilities with critical domain knowledge to harness and shape those capabilities to meet multiple sponsor mission needs We have the technical depth and breadth to thrive in mission focused RampDSampT organizations and the wellearned sponsor credibility to execute work programs relating to research analysis prototyping TampE etcbrbrWe seek motivated individuals who are interested in applying AI and machine learning algorithms for the exploitation of remote sensing data Remote Sensing data refers to those collected using infrared imagery OPIR hyperspectral imagery HSI radar SARGMTI full motion video FMV Wide Are Motion Imagery WAMI and 3D data from a range of sourcesbrbrCome join a team that is committed to strong collaboration intellectual rigor and prototyping gamechanging and tipofthespear operational solutions for our government sponsors In most cases staff are granted substantial flexibility in their working environment including flexible hours and remote work optionsbrbrstronguJob ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliProgramming in Python or other scripting languageliliDeveloping algorithms using machine learning techniques and have familiarity with at least one deep learning framework preferably pyTorch or TensorflowliliPrototyping testing and evaluating algorithms in a team environmentliliAccess to cuttingedge software to analyze large datasets create new analytic tools and address problems of critical national importance including video infrared hyperspectral SAR and others using data exploitations algorithms and scientific software toolsliliWhiteboard brainstorm and problem solve with experienced technical staff to develop solutions for challenging problemsliliLeverage the collective wisdom of the government academia industry and other FFRDCs to create transformational impact and help advance the field by sharing our research via publications and professional conferencesliliEngineer build and test new hardwareelectronics for advanced imaging applicationsliliPerform field experiments to test new sensors and algorithms eg video radar and infrared imagery systems Recent test locations include the White Sands Missile Test Range Nevada Test Site and the Naval Surface Warfare CenterbrliulstronguRequired QualificationsbrustrongulliMasters degree in related technical field with 10 years related experienceliliMust be able to obtain and maintain a TSSCI government security clearanceliliWillingnessability to obtain security clearanceliliDemonstrated projecttask leadership experienceliliDemonstrated ability to foster collaboration across organizational unitsbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliTSSCI ClearancebrliulThis requisition requires the candidate to have a minimum of the following clearancesbrbrTop
